During weekends or holidays, the user tends to disable the recurring alarm and instead sets one-time alarms based on their schedule. They have also expressed interest in exploring additional features, such as gradually increasing alarm volume or integrating with smart home devices to control lights or temperature upon waking up.

Overall, the user's interactions with the assistant in the alarm domain reflect a desire for consistency and efficiency in managing their morning routine, while also appreciating the flexibility to customize and adapt the alarm settings as needed.
